wiki.summary: In the twelfth track on Future Hndrxx Presents: The WIZRD, Future, on the first verse, talks about how he influenced and inspired the newest and younger rappers. This is not the first time the Atlanta rapper has done this, in previous tracks like Afterlife, and Showed Up, he has made the same statements, saying that he’s “their father.” Future went on to Twitter to say that “he made” all the new rappers in a variety of ways, such as flows and ad-libs. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: In the twelfth track on Future Hndrxx Presents: The WIZRD, Future, on the first verse, talks about how he influenced and inspired the newest and younger rappers. This is not the first time the Atlanta rapper has done this, in previous tracks like Afterlife, and Showed Up, he has made the same statements, saying that he’s “their father.” Future went on to Twitter to say that “he made” all the new rappers in a variety of ways, such as flows and ad-libs. While on the second verse, he raps about how his past girls and friends have betrayed him after his success, and that the friends that are true to him are only a few. Read more on Last.fm.
